person.persName: Charles S. Brent (Bourbon County, Kentucky, banker)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, merchant and banker. Son of Hugh Brent. Married to Susan Clarissa Taylor Brent in Bourbon County on July 19, 1831. Father of Hugh Brant. Married to Matilda Chambers Brent. Father of John Brent, Elizabeth Brent, J. Sprigg Breant, Belle Hart Brent, Charles Brent, Hannah Brent, Thomas J. Brent, James A. Brent, Matilda Brent, Henry C. Brent, and Kelly Brent. Married to Martha Harding Ford Brent. Merchant in Bourbon County in 1850. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Banker in Bourbon County in 1860.
